name: ValueBook 15 Laptop
description: Budget 15.6-inch laptop with Intel i5, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD. Great for everyday use.

name: ProBook 15 Laptop
description: 15.6-inch business laptop with Intel i7, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD. Reliable and fast.

name: MegaType Mechanical Keyboard
description: Budget mechanical keyboard with Outemu Blue switches, rainbow LED backlight.

name: MechStrike Pro Mechanical Keyboard
description: Premium mechanical keyboard with Cherry MX Brown switches, per-key RGB, aluminum body.

name: MegaClick Office Mouse
description: Simple wireless office mouse with 1600 DPI, quiet clicks, 12-month battery.

name: PrecisionGlide Wireless Mouse
description: High-DPI wireless mouse with 25,600 DPI sensor, ergonomic shape, long battery.

name: MegaView 27" 4K Monitor
description: 27-inch 4K monitor with USB-C, HDR400, factory calibrated for accurate colors.

name: ClearView 27" 4K Monitor
description: 27-inch 4K IPS monitor with USB-C Power Delivery, color-accurate, adjustable stand.

name: BassBoost Wireless Headphones
description: Over-ear wireless headphones with enhanced bass, 30-hour battery, foldable design.

name: SoundStage Pro Wireless Headphones
description: Premium over-ear headphones with ANC, 40-hour battery, Hi-Res Audio certified.

name: MegaPad XL Desk Mat
description: Extra-large desk mat in vegan leather, 36x17 inches, dual-sided (black/brown).

name: ErgoRise Monitor Arm
description: Gas spring monitor arm for displays up to 32 inches, smooth motion, cable clips.

name: ErgoRise Laptop Stand
description: Aluminum laptop riser with heat dissipation, adjustable height, fits up to 17".

name: LumiDesk LED Desk Lamp
description: Adjustable LED desk lamp with USB port, multiple color temperatures, touch control.

name: MegaCharge USB-C Hub 7-in-1
description: Compact USB-C hub with HDMI 4K, 3 USB-A, SD/microSD, 100W passthrough.

specs.ports: HDMI, 3x USB-A 3.0, SD, microSD, USB-C PD

name: ComfortZone Gel Wrist Rest Keyboard
description: Keyboard wrist rest with cooling gel, ergonomic design, non-slip base.

name: DeskTidy Cable Management Kit
description: Cable organizer bundle with under-desk tray, clips, and velcro ties.

specs.includes: Under-desk tray, 15 clips, 5 velcro straps, 1 cable sleeve

name: MegaView Webcam 1080p
description: 1080p webcam with auto-focus, built-in microphone, privacy shutter.

name: PowerBank 20000mAh
description: High-capacity portable charger with 65W USB-C PD, charges laptops and phones.

name: MegaStrip Smart Power Strip
description: WiFi smart power strip with 4 outlets, 3 USB ports, surge protection, voice control.
